response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value for us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its significance, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to own something that could potentially be worth much more in the future, and we are confident it will meet your expectations and contribute significantly to your endeavors. We look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
